languages.text: "Я... слышу... голоса усопших! Они бежали в леса — от тени, нависшей над миром. Они сражались. Сражались и... проиграли".
"I... hear... the voices of the dead! They ran into the forests — from the shadow that loomed over this world. They fought. They fought and... lost."
languages.original_text: "Я... слышу... голоса усопших! Они бежали в леса — от тени, нависшей над миром. Они сражались. Сражались и... проиграли".

traits.locale_text: "I... hear... the voices of the dead! They ran to the forests — from the shadow that loomed over this world. They fought. They fought and... lost."
"I... hear... the voices of the dead! They ran to the forests — from the shadow that loomed over this world. They fought. They fought and... lost."
"I... hear... the voices of the dead! They ran into the forests — from the shadow that loomed over this world. They fought. They fought and... lost."

"I... hear... the voices of the dead! They ran into the forests — from the shadow that loomed over this world. They fought. They fought and... lost."

languages.text: “我……听到了……那些死者的声音！他们冲进了笼罩在这个世界的阴影之中……跑进了森林。他们和什么人打了起来……之后消失不见了。”
languages.original_text: "I... hear... the voices of the dead! They ran into the forests — from the shadow that loomed over this world. They fought. They fought and... lost."

traits.locale_text: “我……听到了……那些死者的声音！他们冲进了笼罩在这个世界的阴影之中……跑进了森林。他们和什么人打了起来……之后消失不见了。”

languages.text: "Ich ... höre ... die Stimme der Toten! Sie sind in die Wälder gerannt — auf der Flucht vor dem Schatten, der über dieser Welt lag. Sie haben gekämpft. Sie haben gekämpft und ... verloren."
languages.original_text: "I... hear... the voices of the dead! They ran into the forests — from the shadow that loomed over this world. They fought. They fought and... lost."

traits.locale_text: "Ich ... höre ... die Stimme der Toten! Sie sind in die Wälder gerannt — auf der Flucht vor dem Schatten, der über dieser Welt lag. Sie haben gekämpft. Sie haben gekämpft und ... verloren."

languages.text: «¡Yo... oigo... las voces de los muertos! Huyeron a los bosques, huyeron de la sombra que se cierne sobre este mundo. Lucharon. Lucharon... y perdieron».
languages.original_text: "I... hear... the voices of the dead! They ran into the forests — from the shadow that loomed over this world. They fought. They fought and... lost."

traits.locale_text: «¡Yo... oigo... las voces de los muertos! Huyeron a los bosques, huyeron de la sombra que se cierne sobre este mundo. Lucharon. Lucharon... y perdieron».

languages.text: « Je... J'entends... les voix des morts ! Ils se sont enfuis dans la forêt... pour échapper aux ténèbres qui planaient sur ce monde. Ils se sont battus. Ils se sont battus et... ils ont perdu. »
languages.original_text: "I... hear... the voices of the dead! They ran into the forests — from the shadow that loomed over this world. They fought. They fought and... lost."

traits.locale_text: « Je... J'entends... les voix des morts ! Ils se sont enfuis dans la forêt... pour échapper aux ténèbres qui planaient sur ce monde. Ils se sont battus. Ils se sont battus et... ils ont perdu. »

languages.text: 「私には…聞こえる…死者の声が！彼らは森に逃げ込んだ。この惑星に迫る影から。彼らは戦って戦って…負けた」
languages.original_text: "I... hear... the voices of the dead! They ran into the forests — from the shadow that loomed over this world. They fought. They fought and... lost."

traits.locale_text: 「私には…聞こえる…死者の声が！彼らは森に逃げ込んだ。この惑星に迫る影から。彼らは戦って戦って…負けた」

languages.text: "Ben... Ölülerin... Seslerini duyuyorum! Bu dünyanın üzerinde gezinip duran gölgeden kaçmak için ormana koştular. Savaştılar. Savaştılar ve... Kaybettiler."
languages.original_text: "I... hear... the voices of the dead! They ran into the forests — from the shadow that loomed over this world. They fought. They fought and... lost."

traits.locale_text: "Ben... Ölülerin... Seslerini duyuyorum! Bu dünyanın üzerinde gezinip duran gölgeden kaçmak için ormana koştular. Savaştılar. Savaştılar ve... Kaybettiler."
